name: Insomina
summary: Prevents the user from falling asleep, including by Rest.
viability: Insomnia is decent at best. Yes, it prevents sleep status, but aside from that it doesn't really help. Pok√©mon that inflict the sleep status aren't as common as those with Thunder Wave or Will-O-Wisp. The only case where it would be used is Mega Mewtwo Y, only because it's its only ability.
